00046 void
00047 ConnectionManager::add(struct sockaddr_in &addr, time_t timeout,
00048                        const char *service_name, DispatchHandlerPtr &handler) {
00049   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00050   SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr> iter;
00051   ConnectionState *conn_state;
00052 
00053   if (m_impl->conn_map.find(addr) != m_impl->conn_map.end())
00054     return;
00055 
00056   conn_state = new ConnectionState();
00057   conn_state->connected = false;
00058   conn_state->addr = addr;
00059   memset(&conn_state->local_addr, 0, sizeof(struct sockaddr_in));
00060   conn_state->timeout = timeout;
00061   conn_state->handler = handler;
00062   conn_state->service_name = (service_name) ? service_name : "";
00063   boost::xtime_get(&conn_state->next_retry, boost::TIME_UTC);
00064 
00065   m_impl->conn_map[addr] = ConnectionStatePtr(conn_state);
00066 
00067   {
00068     boost::mutex::scoped_lock conn_lock(conn_state->mutex);
00069     send_connect_request(conn_state);
00070   }
00071 }

00075 ConnectionManager::add(struct sockaddr_in &addr, time_t timeout,
00076                        const char *service_name) {
00077   DispatchHandlerPtr null_disp_handler;
00078   add(addr, timeout, service_name, null_disp_handler);
00079 }

00083 ConnectionManager::add(struct sockaddr_in &addr, struct sockaddr_in &local_addr,

00118 bool
00119 ConnectionManager::wait_for_connection(struct sockaddr_in &addr,
00120                                        long max_wait_secs) {
00121   ConnectionStatePtr conn_statePtr;
00122 
00123   {
00124     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00125     SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>::iterator iter =
00126         m_impl->conn_map.find(addr);
00127     if (iter == m_impl->conn_map.end())
00128       return false;
00129     conn_statePtr = (*iter).second;
00130   }
00131 
00132   {
00133     boost::mutex::scoped_lock conn_lock(conn_statePtr->mutex);
00134     boost::xtime drop_time, now;
00135 
00136     boost::xtime_get(&drop_time, boost::TIME_UTC);
00137     drop_time.sec += max_wait_secs;
00138 
00139     while (!conn_statePtr->connected) {
00140       conn_statePtr->cond.timed_wait(conn_lock, drop_time);
00141       boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00142       if (!conn_statePtr->connected && xtime_cmp(now, drop_time) >= 0)
00143         return false;
00144     }
00145   }
00146 
00147   return true;
00148 }

00160 void
00161 ConnectionManager::send_connect_request(ConnectionState *conn_state) {
00162   int error;
00163   DispatchHandlerPtr handler(this);
00164 
00165   if (conn_state->local_addr.sin_port != 0)
00166     error = m_impl->comm->connect(conn_state->addr, conn_state->local_addr,
00167                                   handler);
00168   else
00169     error = m_impl->comm->connect(conn_state->addr, handler);
00170 
00171   if (error == Error::COMM_ALREADY_CONNECTED) {
00172     conn_state->connected = true;
00173     conn_state->cond.notify_all();
00174   }
00175   else if (error != Error::OK) {
00176     if (conn_state->service_name != "") {
00177       HT_ERRORF("Connection attempt to %s at %s failed - %s.  Will retry "
00178                 "again in %d seconds...", conn_state->service_name.c_str(),
00179                 InetAddr::format(conn_state->addr).c_str(),
00180                 Error::get_text(error), conn_state->timeout);
00181     }
00182     else {
00183       HT_ERRORF("Connection attempt to service at %s failed - %s.  Will retry "
00184                 "again in %d seconds...", InetAddr::format(conn_state->addr)
00185                 .c_str(), Error::get_text(error), conn_state->timeout);
00186     }
00187 
00188     // reschedule
00189     boost::xtime_get(&conn_state->next_retry, boost::TIME_UTC);
00190     int32_t sec_addition;
00191     if (System::rand32() % 2)
00192       sec_addition = conn_state->timeout + (System::rand32() % 2);
00193     else
00194       sec_addition = conn_state->timeout - (System::rand32() % 2);
00195     if (sec_addition < 1)
00196       sec_addition = 1;
00197     conn_state->next_retry.sec += sec_addition;
00198     conn_state->next_retry.nsec = ((int64_t)System::rand32() << 32) | System::rand32();
00199 
00200     // add to retry heap
00201     m_impl->retry_queue.push(conn_state);
00202     m_impl->retry_cond.notify_one();
00203   }
00204 
00205 }

00208 int ConnectionManager::remove(struct sockaddr_in &addr) {
00209   bool do_close = false;
00210   int error = Error::OK;
00211 
00212   {
00213     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00214     SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>::iterator iter =
00215         m_impl->conn_map.find(addr);
00216 
00217     if (iter != m_impl->conn_map.end()) {
00218       boost::mutex::scoped_lock conn_lock((*iter).second->mutex);
00219       if ((*iter).second->connected)
00220         do_close = true;
00221       else
00222         (*iter).second->connected = true;  // prevent further attempts
00223       m_impl->conn_map.erase(iter);
00224     }
00225   }
00226 
00227   if (do_close)
00228     error = m_impl->comm->close_socket(addr);
00229 
00230   return error;
00231 }

00245 void
00246 ConnectionManager::handle(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00247   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00248   SockAddrMap<ConnectionStatePtr>::iterator iter =
00249       m_impl->conn_map.find(event_ptr->addr);
00250 
00251   if (iter != m_impl->conn_map.end()) {
00252     boost::mutex::scoped_lock conn_lock((*iter).second->mutex);
00253     ConnectionState *conn_state = (*iter).second.get();
00254 
00255     if (event_ptr->type == Event::CONNECTION_ESTABLISHED) {
00256       conn_state->connected = true;
00257       conn_state->cond.notify_all();
00258     }
00259     else if (event_ptr->type == Event::ERROR ||
00260              event_ptr->type == Event::DISCONNECT) {
00261       if (!m_impl->quiet_mode) {
00262         HT_INFOF("%s; Problem connecting to %s, will retry in %d seconds...",
00263                     event_ptr->to_str().c_str(),
00264                     conn_state->service_name.c_str(), conn_state->timeout);
00265       }
00266       conn_state->connected = false;
00267       // this logic could proably be smarter.  For example, if the last
00268       // connection attempt was a long time ago, then schedule immediately
00269       // otherwise, if this event is the result of an immediately prior connect
00270       // attempt, then do the following
00271       boost::xtime_get(&conn_state->next_retry, boost::TIME_UTC);
00272       conn_state->next_retry.sec += conn_state->timeout;
00273       // add to retry heap
00274       m_impl->retry_queue.push(conn_state);
00275       m_impl->retry_cond.notify_one();
00276     }
00277 
00278     // Chain event to application supplied handler
00279     if (conn_state->handler)
00280       conn_state->handler->handle(event_ptr);
00281   }
00282   else {
00283     HT_WARNF("Unable to find connection for %s in map.",
00284              InetAddr::format(event_ptr->addr).c_str());
00285   }
00286 }

00288 
00292 void ConnectionManager::operator()() {
00293   boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(m_impl->mutex);
00294   ConnectionStatePtr conn_statePtr;
00295 
00296   while (true) {
00297 
00298     while (m_impl->retry_queue.empty())
00299       m_impl->retry_cond.wait(lock);
00300 
00301     conn_statePtr = m_impl->retry_queue.top();
00302 
00303     if (!conn_statePtr->connected) {
00304       {
00305         boost::mutex::scoped_lock conn_lock(conn_statePtr->mutex);
00306         boost::xtime now;
00307         boost::xtime_get(&now, boost::TIME_UTC);
00308 
00309         if (xtime_cmp(conn_statePtr->next_retry, now) <= 0) {
00310           m_impl->retry_queue.pop();
00311           send_connect_request(conn_statePtr.get());
00312           continue;
00313         }
00314       }
00315       m_impl->retry_cond.timed_wait(lock, conn_statePtr->next_retry);
00316     }
00317     else
00318       m_impl->retry_queue.pop();
00319   }
00320 }
